Actions.Name: Create Document from Template
Actions.Description: Generate a document from a selected template

Actions.Name: Create Signing Link
Actions.Description: Generate a link to the document and share it to have the document signed

Actions.Name: Get Document Information
Actions.Description: Get document properties like name, id, create/update dates etc.

Actions.Name: Get Document Fields [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Get Document Fields instead.
Get document field values.

Actions.Name: Get Document Fields (Preview)
Actions.Description: Retrieve values from the fillable fields in the document

Actions.Name: Get document schema [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Get document schema instead.
Get OpenAPI document schema

Actions.Name: Get Document List
Actions.Description: Retrieve a list of user's documents

Actions.Name: Prefill Smart Field Values
Actions.Description: Prefill Smart Field values for the specified document

Actions.Name: Invite to sign
Actions.Description: Invite others to fill out and sign the document

Actions.Name: Advanced Document Invite
Actions.Description: Invite request with manually defined schema. It allows to setup invite for a document that will be generated in the future

Actions.Name: Start flow on document event [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Start flow on document event instead.
You can create trigger for one of this event: document create, document update, document delete, document complete, invite create, invite update

Actions.Name: Start flow on document event (Preview)
Actions.Description: Select the event to trigger on: the new or updated signature invite; when someone creates, updates, completes, or deletes a document

Actions.Name: Prefill Document Field Values [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Prefill Document Field Values instead.
Prefill field values and properties.

Actions.Name: Prefill Document Field Values (Preview)
Actions.Description: Automatically populate fillable fields in the document with specific values
